review: Basically, this game will teach you about the aspects of love. Slowly but gradually, the protagonist shall develop feelings for your soon to be senpai, Akira. Akira is Love. Akira is life. I am Akiras Yaoi fantasy. <3!~~~ My wedding with Akria shall be held on august 20th, 2014. Add for an invitation. Go! Go! Akira!~~~ Akira is 200000 pixels of kawaii.
